metadata.title: CVE-2024-56562 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:i3c: master: Fix miss free init_dyn_addr at i3c_master_put_i3c_addrs()if (dev->boardinfo && dev->boardinfo->init_dyn_addr)                                      ^^^ here check "init_dyn_addr"	i3c_bus_set_addr_slot_status(&master->bus, dev->info.dyn_addr, ...)						             ^^^^							free "dyn_addr"Fix copy/paste error "dyn_addr" by replacing it with "init_dyn_addr".

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-raspi package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
